feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improved support for PayFast Gateway with Token Billing
  • React UI bug fixes
  • v5.12.2 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11067

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.1...v5.12.2

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for composer dependencies
  • v5.12.3 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11068

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.2...v5.12.3

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bug fixes for react UI
  • Fixes for document export - created_at timestamp
  • Mollie fee removal on expired/cancelled transaction
  • v5.12.4 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11080

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.3...v5.12.4

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • React UI fixes
  • Zip reports if raw size > 5mb
  • v5.12.5 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11084

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.4...v5.12.5

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for PDF previews
  • Fixes for Product key selection in exports
  • Updated dependencies
  • Updates for chart queries.
  • v5.12.6 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11092

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.5...v5.12.6
